brief.content-text:
Diagram 2, Image
The diagram depicts two circles. One labeled Minimum, and one labeled Recommended, to represent requirements for building a computer system. The devices outlined in both of the circles are as follows:
MINIMUM SPECIFICATION: Motherboard with CPU, RAM, power supply, hard disk drive
RECOMMENDED SPECIFICATION: Motherboard with CPU, RAM, video card, sound card, hard disk drive, additional microprocessor
